name: Island Times
description:
Hello all!

This is a game myself and a small team made for a class in our Senior Project class. I am planning on using it to prototype a game I am going to work on in my free time, as well as to show as experience for a future job. That being said there are a couple of things i will want to flesh out more for sure such as player sleeping and updated A.I algorithms. Feel free to let me know what you think about everything!

Credit for tree stumps: skyr

Credit for rock collectable: RookieProject
